products.title: Bella Blackout Black 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout black 89mm vertical blind. Made to measure from 13.99 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, bold and cohesive, their bella blackout black vertical blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout vertical blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. At swift direct blind, quality comes first. Their vertical blinds are expertly cut and assembled by their vertical blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do their blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.
 
 Product id: sdb-vtb1374 fabric colour: black material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable   slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes
